verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> feast <S%G1859><s%> of unleavened bread <S%G106><s%> drew nigh, <S%G1448><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might kill <S%G337><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> number <S%G706><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went his way, <S%G565><s%> and communed with <S%G4814><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> captains, <S%G4755><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he might betray <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they were glad, <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> covenanted <S%G4934><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> money. <S%G694><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he promised, <S%G1843><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in the absence of <S%G817><s%> the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened bread, <S%G106><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be killed. <S%G2380><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover, <S%G3957><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> wilt <S%G2309><s%> thou that we prepare? <S%G2090><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> when ye <S%G5216><s%> are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> there shall a man <S%G444><s%> meet <S%G4876><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water; <S%G5204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he entereth in. <S%G1531><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall say <S%G2046><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> goodman <S%G3617><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> guestchamber, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I shall eat <S%G5315><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>
And he <S%G2548><s%> shall show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large <S%G3173><s%> upper room <S%G508><s%> furnished: <S%G4766><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> make ready. <S%G2090><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they went, <S%G565><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he had said <S%G2046><s%> unto them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they made ready <S%G2090><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover. <S%G3957><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> he sat down, <S%G377><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> With desire <S%G1939><s%> I have desired <S%G1937><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I will <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> any more <S%G3765><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> thereof, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G846><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> it be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G1209><s%> the cup, <S%G4221><s%> and gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> divide <S%G1266><s%> it among yourselves: <S%G1438><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I will <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fruit <S%G1081><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall come. <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> which is given <S%G1325><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you: <S%G5216><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> remembrance <S%G364><s%> of me. <S%G1699><s%>

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> after supper, <S%G1172><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> cup is <S%G4221><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> which is shed <S%G1632><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

But, <S%G4133><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of him that betrayeth <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> table. <S%G5132><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> goeth, <S%G4198><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> it was determined: <S%G3724><s%> but <S%G4133><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to inquire <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> <S%G686><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> it was <S%G1498><s%> that should <S%G3195><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> this thing. <S%G5124><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a strife <S%G5379><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> should be accounted <S%G1380><s%> the <S%G1511><s%> greatest. <S%G3187><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> exercise lordship over <S%G2961><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they that exercise authority upon <S%G1850><s%> them <S%G846><s%> are called <S%G2564><s%> benefactors. <S%G2110><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be so: <S%G3779><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he that is greatest <S%G3187><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> let him be <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> younger; <S%G3501><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he that is chief, <S%G2233><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he that doth serve. <S%G1247><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> whether <S%G5101><s%> is greater, <S%G3187><s%> he that sitteth at meat, <S%G345><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> he that serveth? <S%G1247><s%> is not <S%G3780><s%> he that sitteth at meat? <S%G345><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he that serveth. <S%G1247><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> they which have continued <S%G1265><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> temptations. <S%G3986><s%>
And I <S%G2504><s%> appoint <S%G1303><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath appointed <S%G1303><s%> unto me; <S%G3427><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye may eat <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> table <S%G5132><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hath desired <S%G1809><s%> to have you, <S%G5209><s%> that he may sift <S%G4617><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> wheat: <S%G4621><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have prayed <S%G1189><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> fail <S%G1587><s%> not: <S%G3361><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art converted, <S%G1994><s%> strengthen <S%G4741><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> thee, <S%G4671><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> crow <S%G5455><s%> this day, <S%G4594><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> that <S%G2228><s%> thou shalt thrice <S%G5151><s%> deny <S%G533><s%> that thou <S%G3361><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> without <S%G817><s%> purse, <S%G905><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scrip, <S%G4082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shoes, <S%G5266><s%> <S%G3361><s%> lacked <S%G5302><s%> ye any thing? <S%G5100><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he unto them, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> he that hath <S%G2192><s%> a purse, <S%G905><s%> let him take <S%G142><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> his <S%G2532><s%> scrip: <S%G4082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he that hath <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sword, let him sell <S%G4453><s%> his <S%G848><s%> garment, <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> one. <S%G3162><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> that is written <S%G1125><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> be accomplished <S%G5055><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> among <S%G3326><s%> the transgressors: <S%G459><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> are two <S%G1417><s%> swords. <S%G3162><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> It is <S%G2076><s%> enough. <S%G2425><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came out, <S%G1831><s%> and went, <S%G4198><s%> as he was wont, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1485><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives; <S%G1636><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he was <S%G1096><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> that ye enter <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was withdrawn <S%G645><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> a stone's <S%G3037><s%> cast, <S%G1000><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kneeled down, <S%G5087><s%> <S%G1119><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou be willing, <S%G1014><s%> remove <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me: <S%G1700><s%> nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but <S%G235><s%> thine, <S%G4674><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> there appeared <S%G3700><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> strengthening <S%G1765><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> an agony <S%G74><s%> he prayed <S%G4336><s%> more earnestly: <S%G1617><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sweat <S%G2402><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> as it were <S%G5616><s%> great drops <S%G2361><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> falling down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ground. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he rose up <S%G450><s%> from <S%G575><s%> prayer, <S%G4335><s%> and was come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sleeping <S%G2837><s%> for <S%G575><s%> sorrow, <S%G3077><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> sleep <S%G2518><s%> ye? rise <S%G450><s%> and pray, <S%G4336><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> ye enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> spake, <S%G2980><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he that was called <S%G3004><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went before <S%G4281><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drew near <S%G1448><s%> unto Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to kiss <S%G5368><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> betrayest <S%G3860><s%> thou the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> with a kiss? <S%G5370><s%>
